group_1.narration: They read our minds and learned about Lycoris…@Things were touch and go for a bit,@but we managed to prove our innocence.@We decided to form a united front with Yachiyo@and her friends to find our way home!

group_1.textRight: Well, now that we've introduced ourselves...
How do we find our way back?

group_1.textLeft: First, let's talk about what happened@when you guys came here.
Yeah, if there are any clues,@that's where we'll find them!

group_1.textRight: …Understood. Please let me explain.

group_1.narration: "It all started a few hours ago…@The DA gave us orders, and we were@on our way to protect a girl who was@being held captive by terrorists."
"When we arrived at the scene, other Lycoris@had taken care of the main actor,@so all that remained for us was@ensuring the girl's safety."
"However, the girl suddenly vanished…@After failing our mission,@we returned to Café LycoReco.@We were about to leave the shop when…"

group_1.textLeft: The girl disappeared…I see. Did you notice@anything unusual before or after that?

group_1.textRight: I was on the phone with Kusunoki, er, someone@from DA HQ when the call dropped abruptly.
...And, as is often the case,
the protected subject could be heard crying@and screaming at the scene.

group_1.textLeft: Is it because she…was scared?

group_1.textRight: I dunno… It might have been because@the terrorist was killed…

group_1.textLeft: Huh…why? Weren't they the bad guys keeping@her captive?

group_1.textRight: Reportedly, the protected person had been@in captivity for a long time.
It's possible she may have developed positive@feelings towards the criminal.

group_1.textLeft: Stockholm Syndrome…@I've heard of something like that before.

group_1.textRight: Yes... That's why we had to properly protect@and follow her.
If we had gotten there first, we could have@secured the culprit without killing them, but…
…By the way, can magic make someone@suddenly disappear?
Is that something that happens a lot@in this world?

group_1.textLeft: …It's not impossible. Magic could cause your@sudden appearance as well.
Perhaps we should look for something@in this world as the root cause.
Also, your phones still can't connect to anything,@right?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I've tried several times, but I can't even@send a signal from the drone.

group_1.textLeft: Is that a drone?@That's so cool!

group_1.textRight: Right? Our very own computer person made it.
Thanks to that, we can communicate with them@through the drone.
They should be able to monitor us from here...

group_1.textLeft: It might be a communication problem,@or interference by a Witch or [textBlue:Rumor].

group_1.textRight: …Witches are those enemies you mentioned@earlier. [textBlue:Rumors] then…are, well, rumors…?

group_1.textLeft: Here in Kamihama City, rumors and urban@legends can come to life.

group_1.textRight: Another fantasy twist!

group_1.textLeft: That's why they're called [textBlue:Rumors].@Although they should all be gone by now…
If it's [textBlue:Rumor]-related, then we should go talk@to Nemu.
As I recall, Mifuyu should be with them today.
And if it has anything to do with machines,@I'm sure Touka would know a lot.

group_1.textRight: Um, and those people are...?

group_1.textLeft: A pair of kid geniuses… Magical Girls who Yachiyo@has had some business with.
Are they nearby? Those kid geniuses.

group_1.textRight: Yes, they've been spending a lot of time@at the radio telescope lately...
…Ah.
Iroha, did you just…?

group_1.textLeft: Yes…

group_1.textRight: Huh? What's the matter?

group_1.textLeft: …That's the girl we saved from a Witch's@Labyrinth a few days ago.

group_1.textRight: So she ain't a Magical Girl?@It's all good then.

group_1.textLeft: Well, actually…there was a Magical Girl there@with her, however...
[chara:800203:effect_shake]Uuu…aaaAAAAA!
By the time we arrived, the Witch had already...

group_1.textRight: Oh? …Her Doppel didn't come out?

group_1.textLeft: It happened outside of Kamihama…@Had we arrived just a little sooner…

group_1.textRight: …What's going on, everyone?@You've all been silent for a while now.

group_1.textLeft: …It's nothing. Let's move on.
Chisato and Takina are in quite a spot…

group_1.textRight: When it comes to "isekai trips"...wouldn't this@be your domain, Touka?

group_1.textLeft: I suspect this is related to one of your [textBlue:Rumors],@Nemu.

group_1.textRight: I don't recall making any [textBlue:Rumors] that could@bring this about.
...But I can't be certain of that, so I suppose@an investigation is necessary.

group_1.textLeft: Then let's head over to Mikazuki and start@our inquiry!

group_1.textRight: …It doesn't appear that any [textBlue:Rumors] are at hand.

group_1.textLeft: These are some very intriguing circumstances@aside from that.
Another building with a different layout has@replaced Mikazuki Villa's interior.
This flagrant disregard for the laws of physics@makes my heart race!
Oh, that's right! You also mentioned having@communication concerns.
Ah, yes… You can look at it, but...

group_1.textRight: Oh my... This is a well-made drone. I presume@it's the work of someone in your group?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Kurumi…@She's our computer person!
A genius hacker, you know?

group_1.textRight: Hmm… So if I fix this, I'll be able to speak with@this genius Kurumi?

group_1.textLeft: It should still be connected, so…I guess that'd@be possible?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Nemu, I have a brilliant plan.

group_1.textLeft: ...Hang on. It's not dangerous, right?

group_1.textRight: There are only few things more dangerous@than exchanging places between worlds.

group_1.textLeft: You're right, but...
So Nemu, you can't make any new [textBlue:Rumors],@right?

group_1.textRight: Correct. It’s possible I would die were I to make@the attempt.

group_1.textLeft: How about synthesizing an already-existing@[textBlue:Rumor] to work here?

group_1.textRight: It's not impossible depending on the extent...@But no.

group_1.textLeft: What about that [textBlue:Rumor] we shelved because@of its risk?

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, the Uwasa of the Otherworldly Phone@Calls.
…Indeed, that Uwasa could be connected@to this drone…
Enabling us to speak to this genius@from another world…

group_1.textLeft: You're sure it's okay…?

group_1.textRight: ...*Chuckle* As with Touka, I too am intrigued@by this otherworldly genius.
Connecting the phone to another world@is worth the attempt.
…Hmm…@[chara:101471:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101471:lipSynch_1][chara:101471:eyeClose_0]How's that?

group_1.textLeft: No way! You fixed it?!

group_1.textRight: It was simply a matter of making slight rewrites@to the [textBlue:Rumor's] contents.
We've essentially converted the drone into@an otherworldly phone.
Well then, Chisato, may you operate the drone@for us?

group_1.textLeft: Sure thing!

group_1.narration: "...Oh? OH! We finally connected!@Hm? Can you hear me?@Chisato? Takina? Where are you?!@Café LycoReco is in serious trouble!"

group_1.textLeft: Kurumiiiii! We're in another world~!
It really did happen, though…
But you mentioned Café LycoReco being@in trouble?

group_1.narration: "Café LycoReco has become@a completely unrecognizable room.@I'm gonna send you a video right now.@Take a look."

group_1.textRight: It's rude to call it a mess.@That's our house.

group_1.narration: "*Sigh* What the hell is this?@…And who are you anyway?"

group_1.textLeft: That's the thing! We have the inside@of Café LycoReco over here too.

group_1.textRight: …And we're Magical Girls. Perhaps you could@say we're…similar to Lycoris.

group_1.narration: "Ohh… Did we just land@in a giant heap of trouble?"

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Well then, Miss Genius Hacker…
Let's have ourselves a discussion.
